bibl.title: Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte.
This volume also serves as Part IV of: A Catalogue of Roman Portraits in the British Museum. - 6 essays and a catalogue.
bibl.seg: WALKER Susan and Morris BIERBRIER, with Paul ROBERTS and John TAYLOR (Edd.), Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
London, British Museum Press, 1997, 4Â°, 224 pp., 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte. ISBN 0-7141-1905-9 (hbk) / 0-7141-0989-4 (pbk).
This volume also serves as Part IV of: A Catalogue of Roman Portraits in the British Museum. - 6 essays and a catalogue.

C.R. par Dominic Montserrat, AJA 102 (1998) pp. 210-211. - Thomas Schneider, MusHelv 54 (1997) p. 189. - Margot Klee, BJb 198 (1998 [2001]) pp. 582-585 (collectif). - Thelma K. Thomas, BASP 36 (1999) pp. 143-146. - C. Knigge, AW 28 (1997) p. 451. - E. Teeter, JNES 58 (1999) pp. 305-307.
